gaia::media::IAudioStreamInListener Class Reference

 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN (IAudioStreamInListener)

Detailed Description

Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an AudioStreamIn has reached for periodic updates on the progress of the record head, as set by AudioStreamIn#setFrameNotifyListener().

The following example demonstrates how to use the IAudioStreamInListener

 // MyIAudioStreamInListener

 class MyIAudioStreamInListener : IAudioStreamInListener {
 public:
     MyIAudioStreamInListener();
     virtual ~MyIAudioStreamInListener();
     void onPeriodicNotification(AudioStreamIn* recorder);
 };


 // MyIAudioStreamInListener

 void MyIAudioStreamInListener::onPeriodicNotification(AudioStreamIn* recorder) {
    // Do something
    //.....

 }


 MyPage::onInit(Persistence* const savedInstanceState){

       //Initial argument of getFitBufferSize function.
       int32_t sampleRateHz = 44100;
       int32_t channel = AudioControl::CHANNEL_CONFIGURATION_MONO;
       int32_t audioFormat = AudioControl::ENCODING_PCM_16BIT;

     // Increase the ringer volume.
     int32_t recBufSize = AudioStreamIn::getFitBufferSize(sampleRateHz,
               channel, audioFormat);

     // New a AudioStreamIn instance.
       AudioStreamIn *mpAudioStreamIn = new AudioStreamIn(MediaRecorder::AUDIOSOURCE_MIC, sampleRateHz,
               channel, audioFormat, recBufSize);

       // New a listener
     MyAudioStreamInListener *asl = new MyAudioStreamInListener();

     // Set a listener
     mpAudioStreamIn->setFrameNotifyListener(asl);

     // ...

 }
